column1: As we become more connected, we’ll be able to see the cause and effect of our actions in real time—what we buy, donate, eat, and throw away. We’re just starting to unlock and share information about the trillions of things that we’ve made in this world. - Tiffany Shlain

If it's a good idea, go ahead and do it. It's much easier to apologize than it is to get permission.
- Grace Hopper
What's a "method"? -->  a method is an action that can be taken by a javascript object.
What's a "function"? --> a function is a set of rules that indicate one action.

No computer is ever going to ask a new, reasonable question. It takes trained people to do that.
-Grace Hopper

-Bill Viola
